page_content:
RAG Knowledge Base · 28-Day Plan  |  Page 4
Week 4 · Polish: reliability + resume packaging
 Day
Focus
Build
Verify
Commit
Day 22
Prompt + fallback
Add strict 'use context only' prompt +
no-context fallback.
When no context, model says it
cannot answer.
git commit -m "Day22
prompt"
Day 23
Security basics
Limit upload size; sanitize filenames; keep
secrets out of repo.
Large file rejected; no secrets
committed.
git commit -m "Day23
security"
Day 24
Caching
Cache index per file; avoid rebuilding
every chat.
Second query faster; cache-hit
logged.
git commit -m "Day24
caching"
Day 25
Testing
Add minimal pytest for ingestion + search.
pytest passes locally.
git commit -m "Day25
tests"
Day 26
Resume package
Write 3 resume bullets + 2-min project
story.
You can explain trade-offs clearly.
git commit -m "Day26
resume"
Day 27
Mock (project)
Do 1 project walk-through mock; capture
Q&A.
Notion updated with Q&A + gaps.
git commit -m "Day27
mock"
Day 28
Final ship
